metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45942 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: OpenEXR 3.1.x before 3.1.4 has a heap-based buffer overflow inImf_3_1::LineCompositeTask::execute (called fromIlmThread_3_1::NullThreadPoolProvider::addTask andIlmThread_3_1::ThreadPool::addGlobalTask). NOTE: db217f2 may beinapplicable.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
